title: Advanced Control Variable Strategy (CVS) Training: Mastering Experimental Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experimental design skills and understanding of scientific methodologies
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment focusing on hands-on practice and discussion using digital devices. Science education linked to job readiness for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can independently construct single-variable experimental designs and systematically control variables
Learners can identify logical flaws in experimental designs and propose improvement measures
Learners can develop experiment protocols applicable to real scientific problems using CVS (Control-Variable System) principles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
